cross_image_attention_failure.description: Model focuses on only 1-2 images despite questions requiring multiple images

evidence_aggregation_failure.description: Cannot synthesize findings from multiple images into coherent diagnoses

temporal_reasoning_failure.description: Inability to understand disease progression and temporal sequences

spatial_relationship_failure.description: Misses anatomical connections across different image views

error_propagation.description: Early misinterpretation cascades to wrong final conclusions
